channel.title: Bootstrapped.fm episodes #82 & #83: Brian Casel - Founder of Audience Ops
channel.description:
[Part one](http://bootstrapped.fm/82-brian-casel-part-1-founder-of-audience-ops/) and [part two](http://bootstrapped.fm/83-brian-casel-part-2-founder-of-audience-ops/) of our talk with Brian Casel about Audience Ops, the new Audience Ops Calendar, and more.
Thanks to Linode for sponsoring this episode. Sign up today and [get $20 off.](https://linode.com/bootstrappedfm/?utm_source=bootstrapped&utm_medium=podcast&utm_content=20%20dollar&utm_campaign=bootstrapped2016)

item.title: Bootstrapped.fm episodes #82 & #83: Brian Casel - Founder of Audience Ops
item.dc:creator: Gorby
item.description:
I had an issue with #82, it seemed liked my playback was slightly slow. I tried on my podcast app and also from the website. Like it was recorded with a 48kHz sample rate and somehow in encoding it was set to 44.1kHz without any rate conversion. Unfortunately I couldn’t continue. (I don’t use speed up either!, just me )

I haven’t tried #83 yet.

Read full topic
item.source: Bootstrapped.fm episodes #82 & #83: Brian Casel - Founder of Audience Ops
